titles.title: Weighing Intelligence for Smarter Energy Act of 2007
A bill to require the Director of National Intelligence to submit to Congress an unclassified report on energy security and for other purposes.
Weighing Intelligence for Smarter Energy Act of 2007
WISE Act of 2007

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Select Committee on Intelligence.

bill.summary: Weighing Intelligence for Smarter Energy Act of 2007 or WISE Act of 2007 - Requires the Director of National Intelligence to report to Congress on the long-term energy security of the United States, including assessments of: (1) key energy issues that have U.S. national security or foreign policy implications; and (2) the future of world energy supplies.
